Package it.polimi.se2019.controller

Class LobbyController

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.se2019.controller.LobbyController
  • public class LobbyController
extends java.lang.Object
    Manage new Players connection and reconnections. Handles the creation and the linking to the VirtualViews, checking if the username is already used in an active game.

    • Field Summary

      • reconnectPlayer

        public void reconnectPlayer​(java.lang.String username,
                            java.lang.String password,
                            VirtualView view)
        Reconnect a player to a game already started Checks if the player is into the registered games, parsing the related Player.token.
        Parameters:
        username - the requested username
        password - related password
        view - Related client's VirtualView

      • connectPlayer

        public void connectPlayer​(java.lang.String username,
                          java.lang.String password,
                          java.lang.String mode,
                          VirtualView view)
        Add a player to the waiting Players list, linking the VirtualView to the Player. Manage the start of the timeout to start the game if enough players are in. Manage the start of the timer in case of waitingPlayers greater or equal than 3; start game if they are 5.
        Parameters:
        username - chosen username
        password - chosen password
        mode - chosen mode
